column5: The first time you drive up the cool stone driveway of this beautiful vacation retreat, you will be unsure of what to appreciate first: the beautiful serenity of the sun streaming through the large oak trees. The 600+ feet of gorgeous river frontage just a short three minute walk from the house, there is also a paved road down to the river if you prefer to drive. Beautiful Cypress trees in abundance between the property and the Blanco River.
